workshoptitle: Architecting Deep Learning Training Environments on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure

tutorials.title: Prerequisites
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Prepare your Tenancy for the Data Science Service using Infrastructure as Code
tutorials.description: Labs that follow the introduction are numbered, starting with Lab 1

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Build a Convolutional Neural Network in TensorFlow to Classify Traffic Sign Images
Lab 4: Train a Deep Network to Replicate the Human Steering Behavior
